response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This product has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, and I believe it could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. I am confident that this investment would not only be financially beneficial but also align with your strategic goals. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you require any additional information about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
